Title: Vault Artifacts
RewardText:
As you bring me more artifacts, our knowledge of the Incarnates and their time period increases.  

You have my thanks. As a member of the Dragonscale Expedition, I want you to know how important your contributions are. And as a researcher, I want you to know the wealth of discoveries I have made from the artifacts you have brought me is a long-time dream come true. 

Please, take these supplies and use them well.
